downloadTitle: Tablet PC: Advanced Development with Stylus Input APIs (C#)
downloadDescription: The objective of this lab is to familiarize you with using the Tablet PC RealTimeStylus (RTS) APIs.
detailsSection: The objective of this lab is to familiarize you with using the Tablet PC RealTimeStylus (RTS) APIs. To do so, you will create a pair of RTS plug-ins. The first plug-in is a packet filtering plug-in that demonstrates packet modification by constraining all (x,y) packet data within a rectangular area. The second plug-in is a custom dynamic renderer plug-in that renders stylus input by drawing a small circle around each (x,y) point. You will then use your plug-ins in a sample application that is provided for you.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows XP with Tablet PC SDK v 1.7 or later; or Microsoft Windows SDK for Windows Vista
installInstructionSection: Save the file to your computer, and then double click the application to start the installation. By default, the install will place the code in the C:\HOL folder, creating one if necessary. If you choose another install location, adjust the navigation steps in the manual accordingly.
